```py
>>> datetime_series = pd.Series(
...     pd.date_range("2000-01-01", periods=3, freq="us")
... )
>>> datetime_series
0   2000-01-01 00:00:00.000000
1   2000-01-01 00:00:00.000001
2   2000-01-01 00:00:00.000002
dtype: datetime64[ns]
>>> datetime_series.dt.microsecond
0       0
1       1
2       2
dtype: int32 
```
